special_text:
Spark 2 [i](This creature enters with two loyalty counters on it. You may activate a loyalty ability of this permanent once during your turn as a sorcery.)[/i]
[level +1] Exile the top card of each player’s library.
[level -3] Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled with Secrets Extractor, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.
